title: runtime: re-organize arch-specific files
body:
Right now, there are a lot of arch specific files in the runtime
directory. Some of them quite small.

For example, for ppc64, all these files is ppc64 arch-specific:
arch1_ppc64.go, arch_ppc64.go, zgoarch_ppc64.go.

We can't remove zgoarch_ppc64.go and it' auto-generated
anyway. But we can combine arch1_ppc64.go and arch_ppc64.go
into one file though.

Any other ideas?

PS: This problem is brought up in https://golang.org/cl/14447.
